Subject: Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities in CoSoSys Endpoint Protector - ADV-2024-002
Description:
Hi,

We want to understand the advisory posted in the Netwrix support page to check whether it is applied to our environment. 

If yes, how can we apply the hotfix?

We do not see an option available in the Cososys console to select and apply the hotfix.
Solution_Comment__c: Vulnerability patch and its subsequent hotfix have been applied to the server
